note.p: Research Field: Inorganic chemistry, physical chemistry
Education: Ecole Polytechnique, Paris; Ecole des Mines, Paris
Career: Professor of Chemistry, Academy of Geneva (1841-1878); Professor of Mineralogy, Academy of Geneva (1845-1878); determined the atomic weight of 28 elements
References: W P Griffith and P J T Morris, 'Charles Hatchett FRS (1765 - 1847), chemist and discoverer of niobium' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 299 - 316
